Query.Sql: select apc.NHSNumber, apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, coalesce(max(apc.DeliveryDate), max(apc.CDSActivityDate)) as observation_date, apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber, apc.AnaestheticGivenDuringLabourDelivery from omop_staging.sus_APC as apc where apc.AnaestheticGivenDuringLabourDelivery is not null and apc.NHSNumber is not null and apc.CdsType in ('140', '120') group by apc.NHSNumber, apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber, apc.DeliveryDate, apc.AnaestheticGivenDuringLabourDelivery;

Explanation.Description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.
CDS specific hospital spell number that binds many episodes together.
Records whether anaesthetic was given during Labour/ Delivery, and the type used.
Explanation.Origin: ANAESTHETIC GIVEN DURING LABOUR OR DELIVERY CODE
